name: join_tables_and_query
description: Perform a JOIN query across multiple tables in a SQLite database. Optionally filter, export result to file, or store in a temporary table.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file

table1.description: The first (primary) table to select from

join_conditions.description: List of JOIN conditions. Each item must have 'table_name' and 'on_condition'.

table_name.description: Name of the table to JOIN

on_condition.description: SQL ON condition for the JOIN

oneOf.description: A comma-separated string of columns to select.
A list of column names to select.

select_columns.description: The columns to select. Can be provided as a comma-separated string or a list of column names. Defaults to '*' (all columns).

where_clause.description: Optional WHERE clause without the 'WHERE' keyword

where_params.description: Optional parameter list for the WHERE clause

save_to_file.description: Optional path to save the result (.csv or .xlsx)

create_temp_table.description: Optional name of a temporary table to store the result in the database
